participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and reflective, she enjoys sharing her interests with others and appreciates family time.
participant_1.background: I play soccer on the weekends to keep myself active and to have some fun. I haven't had luck with finding a job. I like gardening. I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren. I spend an hour getting ready in the morning.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, he expresses himself through writing and has a deep connection with animals and storytelling.
participant_2.background: I'm single now, but my longest relationship lasted for three years. I will continue to share my love of comic books and animals with others through my blog. I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind. Sometimes I wish I didn't have to wake up in the morning. I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.

content.text: Hi, what are your hobbies?
I love to read comic books and I blog about them.
That is interesting, what do you like about comic books?
I like the stories and the art. I also love the characters.
I like to read horror movies.
I like some horror movies, but I don't like them too scary.
I like them scary, but not too gory.
I love animals.
I like gardening.
I wish I could see what I am gardening.
I hope you find a way to enjoy your garden.
Thank you.
Do you have a job?
I used to be a school teacher, but now I am blind, so I can't.
I'm sorry to hear that.
It is okay.
What do you do now?
I blog about comic books and animals.
That is good.
Yes, I like it.
What are your favorite comics?
I like The Walking Dead and Invincible.
I like The Walking Dead too
